content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's start the negotiation. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to offer 550 Euro per month for the rental of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can get more money for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. How about 600 Euro per month? I think this is a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price is still too low for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Let's try 650 Euro per month. This should reflect the value of the apartment well.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I still think the price is too low for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt, how about 700 Euro per month? This is a good deal for both parties, I believe.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price should be higher for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I think 700 Euro per month is a fair price given the market value and the condition of the apartment. If you're not willing to accept this offer, I may need to reconsider my decision to rent the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
